About Me

Passionate about creating intelligent solutions that make a difference

I'm a full-stack developer and AI researcher with a passion for building intelligent applications that solve real-world problems. My work spans modern web technologies, machine learning, and academic research.

With expertise in Python, FastAPI, React, and TypeScript, I create scalable applications that leverage the latest in AI and machine learning. My research focuses on practical applications of artificial intelligence in web development and user experience design.

When I'm not coding, you can find me contributing to open-source projects, writing technical articles, or exploring the latest developments in AI and machine learning.
